synonyms: vidagdha-mādhava—Vidagdha-mādhava; lalita-mādhava—Lalita-mādhava; nāṭaka-yugala—two dramas; kṛṣṇa-līlā-rasa—the mellow derived from the pastimes of Lord Kṛṣṇa; tāhāṅ—there; pāiye sakala—we can understand all.
translation: Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī also compiled two important dramas named Vidagdha-mādhava and Lalita-mādhava, from which one can understand all the mellows derived from the pastimes of Lord Kṛṣṇa.
